AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Outcast
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on an [PAWN_alienRace] craftworld. However the strict paths of the [PAWN_alienRace] that shape the lives of Craftworld [PAWN_alienRace] proved too much for [PAWN_pronoun].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Outcast
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on an [PAWN_alienRace] craftworld. However the strict paths of the [PAWN_alienRace] that shape the lives of Craftworld [PAWN_alienRace] proved too much for [PAWN_pronoun].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: hermit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Worn out by the pressures of the strict ways required by the Eldar Path, [PAWN_nameDef] left [PAWN_possessive] craftworld to live a simple life in the wilderness. There, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days alone, tending [PAWN_possessive] garden and crafting the simple tools [PAWN_pronoun] needed to survive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: outcast bonesinger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: There is a law that says that you're not allowed to put terawatt-range grasers on a cargo scow. Especially if you hide them under what looks like a communications dish for better ambush potential. [PAWN_nameDef] discovered that there is great profit to be made, however, from those who are uninterested in these laws.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is An Outcast, The Path of the Outcast is the Path, paradoxically, of those Eldar who abandon the disciplined life of the Eldar Paths. Those who desert the Eldar Paths are known as Outcasts on the Craftworlds. The intensely potent and volatile Eldar mind sometimes rebels against the highly structured delineation of achievement which the Eldar Paths offer. Without the protection of the Eldar Paths an individual is likely to eventually succumb to self-destructive urges. The worst fate of all for an Outcast is to fall to the Path of Damnation, but no Eldar will speak of this aberration and so almost nothing is known about it save that they believe it is the Path walked, unknowingly or not, by their Dark Eldar kin. Sometimes young, inexperienced or disgraced Eldar leave their Craftworlds to wander among the stars. Most of the time such Outcasts become Rangers. Some eventually return to their Craftworlds and to the safety of the Paths. Those who are unable to return, for one reason or another, perhaps because they become lost upon the Path of the Outcast, eventually become the Rangers known as Pathfinders. Other Outcasts become pirates, raiders, and Eldar Corsairs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pathfinder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has become lost upon the Path of the Outcast, The Path of the Outcast is the Path, paradoxically, of those Eldar who abandon the disciplined life of the Eldar Paths. Those who desert the Eldar Paths are known as Outcasts on the Craftworlds. The intensely potent and volatile Eldar mind sometimes rebels against the highly structured delineation of achievement which the Eldar Paths offer. Without the protection of the Eldar Paths an individual is likely to eventually succumb to self-destructive urges. The worst fate of all for an Outcast is to fall to the Path of Damnation, but no Eldar will speak of this aberration and so almost nothing is known about it save that they believe it is the Path walked, unknowingly or not, by their Dark Eldar kin. Sometimes young, inexperienced or disgraced Eldar leave their Craftworlds to wander among the stars. Most of the time such Outcasts become Rangers. Some eventually return to their Craftworlds and to the safety of the Paths. Those who are unable to return, for one reason or another, perhaps because they become lost upon the Path of the Outcast, eventually become the Rangers known as Pathfinders. Other Outcasts become pirates, raiders, and Eldar Corsairs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: aeldari pirate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: like many young aeldari walking the path of the Outcast, [PAWN_nameDef] was drawn to Piracy, appearing anywhere that defences are weak and the imperium spread thin. [PAWN_nameDef] was part of this age-old part of existence, extorting and smashing peaceful trade ships for profit.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: aeldari corsair
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a warrior in a Corsair fleet. [PAWN_possessive] job was to punch into enemy starships, gun down the crew, and capture the ship intact. And [PAWN_pronoun] was good at it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: defector
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Early in [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to leave the oppressive Craftworld where [PAWN_pronoun] lived. [PAWN_possessive] actions with a group of Corsair Raiders led to the attentions of the Inquisition, and agents were sent out after [PAWN_objective].\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] spent years on the run, treating [PAWN_possessive] own wounds so no doctor could betray [PAWN_objective]. The ordeal made [PAWN_objective] bitter and untrusting.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: outcast raider
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found great aclaim after leaving [PAWN_possessive] craftworld, [PAWN_pronoun] got in [PAWN_possessive] first fight. [PAWN_pronoun] won, but more important was the enjoyment of [PAWN_possessive] audience. Pit fighting turned out to be a lucrative career for those who could survive it. And it was even mostly legal.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: torturer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Working for a tyrannical dictator, [PAWN_nameDef] earned a reputation as an expert in 'persuasion.' Any prisoner who went down into the dungeons left with no secrets - and with [PAWN_nameDef]'s smile scarred permanently into their nightmares.

AdeptusMechanicus.BackstoryDef.title: outcast assassin
AdeptusMechanicus.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] life outside [PAWN_possessive] craftwrold eventaully led down the path of a professional assassin. [PAWN_pronoun] was cold, calculating,and made a good profit. In this business, the skills learnt on the Path of the Warrior were an asset.
